page.title: 19TRANSPORT:BMX BIKES
page.content: {BMX BICYCLES}NEED TO BE VERY STRONG.ON A{BMX BIKE}YOU CAN DO:{WHEELIES , {CROSS UPS, BUNNY HOPS, KICK TURNS , {BIP-BOPS, BACK HOPS, FRONT HOPS, ROCK {WALKS}AND{ALTERNATORS}.THE LONGEST{ {WHEELIE}IN THE{WORLD}IS{2 MILES LONG} AND IT WAS DONE BY{CRAIG STRONG}.THE HIGHEST{BUNNY HOP}IN THE{WORLD}IS{48 {INCHES HIGH}BY{TIM MARCH}.THE LONGEST{ {JUMP}IS{4 CARS LONG}.THE PERSON WHO DID THE JUMP WAS{NEIL RUFFEL}.HE DID IT AT{BOURNEMOUTH RACING STADIUM}. FOR{BMX}YOU COULD HAVE ALL DIFFERENT COLOUR{TYRES,}LIKE{BLACK, YELLOW, RED} AND{BLUE}.YOU CAN GET DIFFERENT{BRAKES {- M.X.}ARE THE TYPE MANY PEOPLE LIKE . THE BEST{WHEELS}YOU CAN GET ARE:{ {SKYWAYS, Z-RIMS, ARAYAS}AND{ {REINFORCEMENTS.}THERE ARE 2 SECTIONS IN{BMX:FREESTYLE (STUNTS)}AND{RACING. {BMX}STARTED IN THE{USA.}THIS IS {BMX } IN{1985}.
